short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mutes Netflix when a curse word is said. Works as of 2023. Captions need to be on for this to work. Only for English curse words.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This free extension will simply censor curse words / profanity on Netflix. There are a variety of great shows on the streaming platform that some would prefer to not have profanity. Most of the solutions to this problem are not ideal, or have stopped working all together, so this extension was created to help.
